snippet: Russia needs to know that defiance of arms control treaties will come at a cost.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to persist in trying to find diplomatic solution to dispute with Russia over Intermediate-range Nuclear Forces Treaty, which bans both sides from deploying certain ballistic and cruise missiles; warns heeding call of some congressmen to withdraw from treaty will remove all restraints on Pres Vladimir Putin, who seems bent on trying to reform a Soviet Union; holds Russia must know that defying the treaty will come with grievous cost.
lead_paragraph: Russia needs to know that defiance of arms control treaties will come at a cost.

headline.main: A Vital Nuclear Agreement, at Risk
headline.print_headline: A Vital Nuclear Agreement, at Risk

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
